titles.title: A resolution designating the week beginning October 3, 2010, as "National Nurse-Managed Health Clinic Week".
A resolution designating the week beginning October 3, 2010, as "National Nurse-Managed Health Clinic Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates the week beginning October 3, 2010, as National Nurse-Managed Health Clinic Week and expresses support for its goals and ideals.
Encourages the expansion of such clinics so that they may continue to serve as health care workforce development sites for the next generation of primary care providers.
